I value monogamy in a relationship.
I love getting my favorite coffee from Starbucks after a long day at the lab.
i like the flintstones.

participant_2.background:
I read a poem or two to get my creative juices flowing before starting my day.
I am a stay at home mom because my depression and anxiety makes it difficult for me to work outside the home.
I ride my scooter down the boardwalk until the wind blows away my worries.
I tried my hand at gambling, but I didn't have the stomach for it.
I paint my nails in different colors to match my outfits.

content.text: Hi back! How are you today?
I'm good! I just got back from the lab. I'm a scientist.
Oh wow, that's cool! What kind of scientist?
I'm a marine biologist. I study the ocean and its creatures.
That's amazing! I love the ocean! Have you ever seen a mermaid?
No, I haven't! But I've heard that they exist.
I'm sure they do! I bet they're beautiful.
What do you do for fun?
I like to read, go for walks on the beach, and spend time with my dog.
That sounds like fun! I like to read, too. And I love going for walks on the beach. I don't have a dog, though.
You should get one! They're great companions.
I know, I know! I've been thinking about it.
Well, if you ever do, I know a great breeder.
Thanks! I'll keep that in mind
